lines.text: Appropriate sparks are flying, somebody cue the power ballad.
Hey, teacher, leave them kids alone.
Don't worry about the snakes in your garden when you've got spiders in your bed.
The Yogurt Shop, Yogurt Shoppe, what the fuck's a Shoppe?
Mr. Newberry here has got the full-on Boo Radley, village idiot, Quasimoto thing going, don't you Mr. Newb?
Bad wrong, wrong bad, bad wrong, wrong bad.
Meet the musical little creatures that hide among the flowers.
[U.V. isn't sure if Steve Clark is now one of the Blue Ribbons]
Wait man, what's the capital of North Dakota?
How the fuck should I know?
All right. You're still okay.
Be the ball.
[as Steve is leaving]
Wait...
[Steve stops, turns back]
You like Kurt Vonnegut?
I don't get it.
Haven't you ever wanted to just disappear, lunch boy? Poof, you're gone? You'd be surprised how interesting people become when they think you're *really* stupid.
Sounds razor.
[shoots Gavin to prevent him from shooting Rachel and Steve]

[falls to the ground, bleeding]
Three times? You had to shoot me three times?

[voice breaking]
Sorry, man.
Wow. I get to say to my twisted family... I guess this diminishes my chances of ever meeting Trent Reznor...
[about to die]
Wow, I guess I'm finally coming around...
Hello, Lorna. How are you doing today, my dear?
Drop dead.
Contact.
Science is God.
Treat yourself.
Every time one of these kids gets a hard-on they go out and beat somebody with it!
Listen, the last ferry leaves at eleven thirty. Just tell me you have a razor plan?
I am making this shit up as I go.
Come on, Rae-Rae, give up the plate for old Chug.
Look at him, he's killing his hard-on.
Who put the acid in my Spam?
[Blood running down her face]
I have to go home. I've got a big physics test tomorrow.
Will you go out with me?
No.
WHY NOT?
Tell me, Shannon, do you get yelled at when you talk about your dead grandfather?
Steve...
'Cause around here, people go crazy if you talk about a dead brother.
Gavin thinks some sinister force has taken over the Cradle Bay meatheads.
A sinister force?
You know, evil. Nowhere to turn, no one to trust, altogether ooky.
I had no idea the evil was this pervasive.
I bet you didn't know toast came in 3 flavors.
Do good things, lunch boy.
I've got like, two customers left! If this keeps up, I'm going to be the 7-11 guy!
[after Steve begs for the family to head back to Chicago, Dr. Caldicott steps inside the Clark house]
Steven, you ARE home. Cradle Bay is where you belong, here with your family.
You signed me up for the program?
We want what's best for you.

[screaming]
WHAT ABOUT WHAT I WANT?
Steven, do you think you're really happy...
Oh, shut the up! You sold me out.
Don't do this! Maybe they can be helped!
No they can't. And neither can I.
[shows the gunshot wound to his stomach]
Evening Officer!
What are you doing?
Oh, I'm getting rid of rats!
Rachel, this is Stevie Boy - good man. Stevie Boy, this is Rachel - Cook's Ridge trash.

[disgusted]
Bite me.

[awkwardly]
You had friends in Chicago?
Yeah.
You can have friends here.

[after seeing Chug in a fight]
What was that about?
Toxic jock syndrome.

[Blue Ribbons circle around Steve]
Ice ice baby.

[sees Andy Effkin being talked to by police]
Andy Effkin toasts with the most.

[snaps Mary Jo's neck]
Slut.
Why don't you make like a tree and leave?
Clever girl.
This town sucks for heroes.
